summary: An international relations professional who has served in numerous public sector roles as a national and international civil servant and diplomat in Africa, Asia and Europe. Considerable experience working in commercial relations, in international development issues, and in management roles. Culturally and linguistically versatile, fits particularly into an organisation or company with an international profile.
